title: Coronavirus: Dealing with mass unemployment
description: What will the jobs market look like after the coronavirus pandemic ends?

vocabItems.definition: relating to a short period of time
situation in which one event produces a series of further effects to happen one after the other
authority to employ someone and release them from employment, sometimes in quick succession
job that you can stay in all your working life
process of learning new skills or undergoing training to become better at your job
expensive, impressive and large in quantity
